value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop! value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.
